TopicTitle: Fast and the Kerbalus - Hover Car Race

Articles.Content:
This is the FAST and KERBALUS Speed Trials.

Create your best hovercraft and race from KSC to the Island Base.

Speed Trial Rules:

  • The craft must not be destroyed or take damage
  • Must stay within the permitted mods
  • No flying, only hover (anti-grav pods) permitted
  • Must cross the runway and land
  • Time is based on crossing the runway not the landing (this round)
  • Must race from KSC Runway and cross the Island Base Runway

Mods Allowed:

Kerbal Foundaries: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-WIP-PARTS-PLUGIN-0-25-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks

TweakScale: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234-24-2-TweakScale-Rescale-Everything!-(v1-33-2014-07-28-20-00-UTC)

Engines

  • Stock (any stock engine)

Till Sunday at 11:59pm will be taking your best speeds! Post your time and shot of your craft by Sunday 11:59pm

Scoring? None Speed is the ONLY thing. Fastest speeds to cross the island runway proceed to the next round.

Baseline "Best" Time: Jatwaa - 5 Mins (beat 5 mins and you are golden, get faster and secure your spot in the next round)

Top 10 Speeds (depending on number of people that try) continue to Round 2!

What mods will round 2 hold in store?????

Edited November 23, 2014 by Jatwaa

New Contender! Greydragon has entered the fray with the time of 3:35!

Check out his video! Can you best 5 minutes or even 3:35?
How about 3:24?

How about 3:24?

NICCEE! I must admit my last run was dreadful at 4 minutes flat, so this blows me out of the water!

In all fairness to you, I was going with the bare minimum needed for the run. If I let either the engines or antigrav pods keep running just a minute longer, I would not have made it unscathed. That's why I killed the engines and let gravity do the work of slowing me down to land. Nonetheless I'm working on Cigare Volare Mk.2 for the next race....

And I posted my craft file if you want to look at it:

http://kerbalx.com/crafts/379
If only this challenge allowed jets with auto-hovering scripts...

I'm guessing FAR is a no-no? I despise stock aero.

P.S. While it's easier to go faster with FAR, it's also MUCH harder to control.

P.P.S. I will submit two entries anyway. One all stock (plus gravs) and one without limits (because you can't stop me).

P.P.P.S. I'm wondering if I can beat the 5 minute baseline time with my podracer...

P.P.P.P.S. Jatwa, you actually misspelled Foundries.
